title: For Iran’s Rulers, Refusing U.S. Demands Is a Risk Worth Taking
summary_full: The government in Tehran sees capitulating to Washington’s demands on uranium enrichment and ballistic missiles as riskier to its survival than going to war, analysts say.
summary_public: The government in Tehran sees capitulating to Washington’s demands on uranium enrichment and ballistic missiles as riskier to its survival than going to war, analysts say.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Refusing U.S. Demands Is a Risk Worth Taking
